last_episode_to_air.name: Really Close Encounters
last_episode_to_air.overview: Is there life in outer space? Rob Riggle is on the case and heads to the Nevada desert, a UFO hotspot. He meets with an ex-CIA agent, Air Force pilots, a professional UFO hunter and a team of investigators.

name: Rob Riggle Global Investigator
overview: Actor, comedian and retired Marine Rob Riggle is taking on a new mission: traveling the globe to unearth some of the worldâ€™s greatest legends and mysteries.
